titleStmt.title: A proclamation for re-calling and prohibiting sea-men from the services of forreign princes and states. At Edinburgh, the seventh day of June, one thousand six hundred and sixty four.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed: Pet. Wedderburne, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
